problem.markdown:
>>What are the goals of this course? <<
[x] To explain important measures of system performance. [x] To show the importance of random, potentially disruptive events in factories. [ ] To describe all common-sense approaches. [x] To give some intuition about behavior of these systems. [x] To describe and justify some quantitative tools and methods.
[Explanation] See slide 14 of the handout. [Explanation]

choiceresponse.label: What are the goals of this course?

checkboxgroup.choice: To explain important measures of system performance.
To show the importance of random, potentially disruptive events in factories.
To give some intuition about behavior of these systems.
To describe and justify some quantitative tools and methods.
